sqlMap.select: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_REGNO1, MEM_REGNO2, TO_CHAR(MEM_BIR,'YYYY-MM-DD')MEM_BIR, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADD1, MEM_ADD2, MEM_HOMETEL, MEM_COMTEL, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, MEM_JOB, MEM_LIKE, MEM_MEMORIAL, TO_CHAR(MEM_MEMORIALDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD')MEM_MEMORIALDAY, MEM_MILEAGE, MEM_DELETE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #id#
